item.title: Set Chromeos Sudo Password
item.description: When you enable developer mode you are prompted to set a root password but this is not the SUDO password. You must set a new SUDO password. Press CTRL-ALT-F2 (or Forward) Login as root. At the prompt type: chromeos-setdevpasswd Thatâ€™s it!

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m an Infrastructure Engineer, and freelancer, working in the energy sector. In my current role I am focused on Operational Technology (OT) and Cyber Security. I have 30+ years experience in the core technologies: compute, network, storage, virtualization, and cloud. I love what I do and I want to share. This site is dedicated to how-to’s, code snippets, and projects I’m involved in. Welcome and enjoy! In Him. dlr
